newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech investigator says charges top IPB officials.
newsitem.headline: Czech investigator says charges top IPB officials.

text.p: Two senior officials at the Czech Republic's third largest bank by basic capital IPB a.s. have been charged with fraud, investigators said on Tuesday.
No-one at IPB was available for comment.
Zdenek Pichlik, deputy director of the Prague Investigation Office, told Reuters that two senior officials at the bank had been charged but he refused to name them.
"Two leading members of IPB are subject to prosecution," he said adding that the two were formally charged on Tuesday.
He refused to give details of the charges but said police were not at present considering charging any other individuals.
